discord-action-addsection:
Used in the Discord skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=discord}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
discord-action-delete:
Used in the Discord skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=discord}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
discord-action-move:
Used in the Discord skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=discord}}

{{Identical|Move}}
discord-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in discord skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
discord-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in discord skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
discord-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in discord skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
discord-view-create:
Tab label in the Discord skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=discord}}
{{Identical|Create}}
discord-view-edit:
Tab label in the Discord skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=discord}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
discord-view-history:
Tab label in the Discord skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=discord}}
{{Identical|View history}}
discord-view-view:
Tab label in the Discord skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=discord}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
discord-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the Discord skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
discord-more-actions: Label in the Discord skin's menu for the less-important or rarer actions which are not shown as tabs (like moving the page, or for sysops deleting or protecting the page), as well as (for users with a narrow viewing window in their browser) the less-important tab actions which the user's browser is unable to fit in. {{Identical|More}}
